replies.body: Is there anyway at all to get a skin code if you didnt get a ticket and live in sydney? I really want one :c
same
Maybe they could set up a showbag store say like Easter show and we could buy the showbags with the skin codes and some other stuff.
hope they do (not to be rude) but not selling bags is kinda a dick move
If you're willing to trust a stranger who lives in Perth, WA with $15, they can buy a ticket to the Viewing Party for you (which includes the showbag thing)
Hope everyone has a great time, very jealous i missed out
Come on down and take part in the community activities.
If I am in the top 10 in the art comp, how do I get my prizes?
I'm not coming because no ticket and I'm coming only for the match or I'll come if I get to take pics with like the Chiefs or something.

Best to read all the detail about the art competition [here](https://www.facebook.com/LeagueOfLegendsOceania?sk=app_451684954848385&brandloc=DISABLE&app_data=chk-5548b6a23423a). Any more questions let me know.
also since you only win one ticket and im a child, how can my dad come?
ik just wondering cause i wanna go so badly for my birthday
Enter Pulsefire and see how you get on. Good luck my friend!
Is there anyway at all to get a skin code if you didnt get a ticket and live in sydney? I really want one :c
Is there a way to get the skin code without a ticket (Sold out) I really want the unique (?) skin ;_;
Hi Pancake, sorry its in the show bag for the OPL Final ticket holders.
too bad im in nz riot come do it here 1 year
If you are in Auckland Hoyts are playing the final live on the big screen. See [here](http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/oplfinals-2015/) for more info.

I'm mostly interested in just buying t-shirts and stuff. I didn't want to buy a ticket because I know other people have the time to see the OPLs. I don't have that time, so Rito gear is all I can afford. Can Rito confirm that the t-shirts sold on the day will at least cost less than the ticket? 

(maybe even like selling Rito gift bags like the Easter show)
Hi Strayfire, merchandise will be on sale and the prices will be as per our existing merchandise store. Hope this helps.
i need help if i watch the grand finals at hoyts will i get any goodie bag as it says at hoyts.
Hi XternalCurse there will be a goodie bag but it will not be exactly the same as the one at the park, but it will still contain a skin code.
a quick question, if you don't make it to get a ticket then can you still buy a ticket and get a show bag and all that?
Hi, no sorry the show bag is for the ticket holders but come on down to the community activities we will have plenty of swag!
{{summoner:12}}s to Luna Park XD
Got my ticket already! cant wait! Are you still able to walk into Luna Park without a ticket however?
Yes the park is open and you can come in from 11am and take part in the free community activities.
Is it possible to still get free skin codes and are there other riot showbags available. Would suck for us to miss out on skincodes, tickets were literally sold out in hours :(
They were sold out in about 24 hours, give or take a few. My team and I got 5 and we get to meet each other finally! Cheers Riot!
My team and I have already got tickets! woop woop! See everyone there!
see you there bro. i might not even see you lol
maybe not, but it will be sick to meet heaps of other league fans!
Wake me up when the winner goes to the next level <3

Thats what the school teachers say about you're career prospects.

But enough of you're life story

Missed out {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
Have fun you guys.
Hey was just wondering if you could say what kind of murchandise they are selling at the store
plz i want only one ticket :"(
Sorry there all sold out but come on down to the park for the free activities.
Are there still spots for the Hoyts in WA? I checked the site and it said it had no free tickets?
Yes there are I checked with HOYTS and they are not sold out.
What skin code is it? A certain skin, or random? They gave no information on what skin code it is. I'm just curious.
Hi, its a surprise :). Do you have a ticket for the final? If not we have skin codes in our Hoyts swag bags also.

so does this mean riot wont be at pax melbourne this year? i seriously hope so because that is the bigger event stage! cosplay, community involvement everything....i have friends playing league because of PAX last year
Hi we wont be at PAX this year but we will be having cosplay and other cool community activities at the OPL Grand Final.

the problem there is most cosplayers wont travel interstate for a one day event. Perhaps an idea for future is coinciding OPL finals with a big event IE PAX or Supanova and having it around the same timeframe (within a day or so either side) or even on the same weekend. Attendance would definately be higher not just from cosplayers but general public aswell especially for evening timeframes as supanova PAX etc close the floors around 5-6pm
Hey, good feedback and we will consider this in the future. Are you planning to come to OPL?
Can you still get the skin code if you didnt buy the ticket i didnt get to buy one because they were sold out in hours {{item:3070}}
No sorry there in the show bags for the ticket holders.
Will you guys still be at Pax?
Hi sorry no we wont be at PAX.
